name: state-router-example
description: Examples of abstract-state-router usage with various templating/rendering libraries

scripts.build: npm run build:riot && npm run build:ractive && npm run build:ractive-redux && npm run build:virtualdom && npm run build:ko && npm run build:svelte
scripts.watch:ractive-redux: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -t brfs -d implementations/ractive-redux/index.js -o implementations/ractive-redux/bundle.js
scripts.build:ractive-redux: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -t brfs implementations/ractive-redux/index.js | uglifyjs - -mc -o implementations/ractive-redux/bundle.js
scripts.watch:svelte: watchify -t sveltify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .js,.html ] -d implementations/svelte/index.js -o implementations/svelte/bundle.js
scripts.build:svelte: browserify -t sveltify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .js,.html ] implementations/svelte/index.js | uglifyjs - -mc -o implementations/svelte/bundle.js

author: TehShrike
